verses.verse: <S%H3478>Israel<s%> is an <S%H1238>empty<s%> <S%H1612>vine<s%>, he bringeth <S%H7737>forth<s%> <S%H6529>fruit<s%> unto himself: according to the <S%H7230>multitude<s%> of his <S%H6529>fruit<s%> he hath <S%H7235>increased<s%> the <S%H4196>altars<s%>; according to the <S%H2896>goodness<s%> of his <S%H776>land<s%> they have made <S%H2895>goodly<s%> <S%H4676>images<s%>. an: or, a vine emptying the fruit which it giveth images: Heb. statues, or, standing images

Their <S%H3820>heart<s%> is <S%H2505>divided<s%>; now shall they be found <S%H816>faulty<s%>: he shall break <S%H6202>down<s%> their <S%H4196>altars<s%>, he shall <S%H7703>spoil<s%> their <S%H4676>images<s%>. Their heart: or, He hath divided their heart break: Heb. behead images: Heb. statues, or, standing images
For now they shall <S%H559>say<s%>, We have no <S%H4428>king<s%>, because we <S%H3372>feared<s%> not the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>; what then should a <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H6213>do<s%> to us?

They have <S%H1696>spoken<s%> <S%H1697>words<s%>, <S%H422>swearing<s%> <S%H7723>falsely<s%> in <S%H3772>making<s%> a <S%H1285>covenant<s%>: thus <S%H4941>judgment<s%> springeth <S%H6524>up<s%> as <S%H7219>hemlock<s%> in the <S%H8525>furrows<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%>.

The <S%H7934>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H8111>Samaria<s%> shall <S%H1481>fear<s%> because of the <S%H5697>calves<s%> of <S%H1007>Bethaven<s%>: for the <S%H5971>people<s%> thereof shall <S%H56>mourn<s%> over it, and the <S%H3649>priests<s%> thereof that <S%H1523>rejoiced<s%> on it, for the <S%H3519>glory<s%> thereof, because it is <S%H1540>departed<s%> from it. the priests: or, Chemarim

It shall be also <S%H2986>carried<s%> unto <S%H804>Assyria<s%> for a <S%H4503>present<s%> to <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H3377>Jareb<s%>: <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> shall <S%H3947>receive<s%> <S%H1317>shame<s%>, and <S%H3478>Israel<s%> shall be <S%H954>ashamed<s%> of his own <S%H6098>counsel<s%>.
As for <S%H8111>Samaria<s%>, her <S%H4428>king<s%> is cut <S%H1820>off<s%> as the <S%H7110>foam<s%> <S%H6440>upon<s%> the <S%H4325>water<s%>. the water: Heb. the face of the water

The high <S%H1116>places<s%> also of <S%H206>Aven<s%>, the <S%H2403>sin<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, shall be <S%H8045>destroyed<s%>: the <S%H6975>thorn<s%> and the <S%H1863>thistle<s%> shall come <S%H5927>up<s%> on their <S%H4196>altars<s%>; and they shall <S%H559>say<s%> to the <S%H2022>mountains<s%>, <S%H3680>Cover<s%> us; and to the <S%H1389>hills<s%>, <S%H5307>Fall<s%> on us.

O <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, thou hast <S%H2398>sinned<s%> from the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H1390>Gibeah<s%>: there they <S%H5975>stood<s%>: the <S%H4421>battle<s%> in <S%H1390>Gibeah<s%> against the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5932>iniquity<s%> did not <S%H5381>overtake<s%> them.

It is in my <S%H185>desire<s%> that I should <S%H3256>chastise<s%> them; and the <S%H5971>people<s%> shall be <S%H622>gathered<s%> against them, when they shall <S%H631>bind<s%> themselves in their <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H5869>furrows<s%>. when: or, when I shall bind them for their two transgressions, or, in their two habitations

And <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> is as an <S%H5697>heifer<s%> that is <S%H3925>taught<s%>, and <S%H157>loveth<s%> to tread <S%H1758>out<s%> the corn; but I passed <S%H5674>over<s%> upon her <S%H2898>fair<s%> <S%H6677>neck<s%>: I will make <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> to <S%H7392>ride<s%>; <S%H3063>Judah<s%> shall <S%H2790>plow<s%>, and <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> shall break his <S%H7702>clods<s%>. her: Heb. the beauty of her neck

<S%H2232>Sow<s%> to yourselves in <S%H6666>righteousness<s%>, <S%H7114>reap<s%> <S%H6310>in<s%> <S%H2617>mercy<s%>; break <S%H5214>up<s%> your fallow <S%H5215>ground<s%>: for it is <S%H6256>time<s%> to <S%H1875>seek<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, till he <S%H935>come<s%> and <S%H3384>rain<s%> <S%H6664>righteousness<s%> upon you.

Ye have <S%H2790>plowed<s%> <S%H7562>wickedness<s%>, ye have <S%H7114>reaped<s%> <S%H5766>iniquity<s%>; ye have <S%H398>eaten<s%> the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of <S%H3585>lies<s%>: because thou didst <S%H982>trust<s%> in thy <S%H1870>way<s%>, in the <S%H7230>multitude<s%> of thy mighty <S%H1368>men<s%>.

Therefore shall a <S%H7588>tumult<s%> <S%H6965>arise<s%> among thy <S%H5971>people<s%>, and all thy <S%H4013>fortresses<s%> shall be <S%H7703>spoiled<s%>, as <S%H8020>Shalman<s%> <S%H7701>spoiled<s%> <S%H1009>Betharbel<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H4421>battle<s%>: the <S%H517>mother<s%> was dashed in <S%H7376>pieces<s%> upon her <S%H1121>children<s%>.

<S%H3602>So<s%> shall <S%H1008>Bethel<s%> <S%H6213>do<s%> unto you <S%H6440>because<s%> of your <S%H7451>great<s%> <S%H7451>wickedness<s%>: in a <S%H7837>morning<s%> shall the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H1820>utterly<s%> be cut <S%H1820>off<s%>. your: Heb. the evil of your evil
